answers.answer: Hi,How are you? What other symptoms are present? Double vision or diplopia can be caused by a variety of issues involving problems with any part of the vision system such as cornea problems ( infection, scarring, drynesss); lens problems( cataract); muscle  as well as nerve problems. Medical conditions such as diabetes, and brain issues like stroke, aneurysm, and even migraine headaches may also be responsible. The cervical protrusion maybe also be involved indirectly and it is best that you have this checked by your doctor or be referred to an eye doctor for proper evaluation. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: is my doubvle vision related to c5/6 c6.7 protrusion
title: tonia r barton
